attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

ability.name: Irritating Pollen
ability.text: Each player can't play any Item cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Windmill
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flower Tornado
attacks.text: Move as many {G} Energy attached to your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

ability.name: Poisonous Nest
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this Ability. Both Active Pokémon (except for {G} Pokémon) are now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Impound
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Unseen Claw
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Sleep Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Jagged Saber
attacks.text: You may attach up to 2 {G} Energy cards from your hand to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, heal all damage from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bee Revenge
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Intelligence Gathering
attacks.text: You may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Bee Drain
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Bail Out
attacks.text: Put 2 Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Prize Count
attacks.text: If you have more Prize cards left than your opponent, this attack does 80 more damage.

ability.name: Flare Effect
ability.text: Each of your Stage 1 Pokémon in play is now a {R} Pokémon in addition to its existing types.

attacks.name: Heat Breath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Burning Roar
attacks.text: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are {R} Energy cards, attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Combat Blaze
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flame Screen
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Heat Tackle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Solar Birth
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Burning Scales
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Wind Wheel
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Epic Splash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Berserker Splash
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Aqua Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Full Retaliation
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on each of your Benched Magikarp.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

ability.name: Aqua Effect
ability.text: Each of your Stage 1 Pokémon in play is now a {W} Pokémon in addition to its existing types.

attacks.name: Deep Sea Search
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Resistance Blizzard
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon by Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Glaciate
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Icecalibur
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon. The Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Electric Effect
ability.text: Each of your Stage 1 Pokémon in play is now a {L} Pokémon in addition to its existing types.

attacks.name: Thunder Blast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sparkling Tail
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder Rod
attacks.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and attach as many {L} Energy cards you find there as you like to this Pokémon. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Exavolt
attacks.text: You may do 50 more damage and leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed. If you do, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Electric Mischief
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into his or her deck.

ability.name: Farewell Letter
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may discard this Pokémon and all cards attached to it (this does not count as a Knock Out). If you do, draw a card.

attacks.name: Future Spin
attacks.text: Look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

attacks.name: Rewind
attacks.text: Devolve each of your opponent's evolved Pokémon and put the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Smash Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Double Type
ability.text: As long as this Pokémon is in play, it is {P} and {F} type.

attacks.name: Superpower
attacks.text: You may do 40 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

ability.name: Scoundrel Ring
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon-EX (except for Hoopa-EX), reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Hyperspace Fury
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Crazy Hammer
attacks.text: If this Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 80 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Steaming Mad
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokémon. This Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Landslide
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Unyielding Rock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Double Lariat
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Dig Out
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a {F} Energy card, attach it to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Break Ground
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Destroyer King
attacks.text: This attack does 60 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bewitching Eyes
attacks.text: Choose a Supporter card from your opponent's discard pile and use it as the effect of this attack.

attacks.name: Furtive Drop
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ink Spit
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Trash Tentacle
attacks.text: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Entangling Control
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon. The new Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Bullet Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

ability.name: Magnetic Warp
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Iron Cannon
attacks.text: You may discard all {M} Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Machine Gun Stomp
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each card in your hand.

attacks.name: Forbidden Iron Hammer
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, discard an Energy attached to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Iron Head
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Calm Mind
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

ability.name: Bright Heal
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Cotton Bed
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Windy Mischief
attacks.text: Move all damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

ability.name: Renegade Pulse
ability.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon by your opponent's Mega Evolution Pokémon.

attacks.name: Chaos Wheel
attacks.text: Your opponent can't play any Pokémon Tool, Special Energy, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

ability.name: Water Down
ability.text: Whenever you attach a {W} Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, you may search your deck for Goomy and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Shining Breath
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Liquid Blow
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each {C} in its Retreat Cost. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Act Tough
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any {D} Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Fake Out
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Data Check
attacks.text: Look through your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Tri Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Cyber Crush
attacks.text: Discard all Special Energy attached to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Slowing Beam
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's attacks cost {C} more.

attacks.name: Digital Reboot
attacks.text: Devolve as many of your Benched Pokémon as many times as you like. Put each Evolution card removed this way into your hand.

attacks.name: Dazzle Blast
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Aero Ball
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Deep Hurricane
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 70 more damage. Then, discard that Stadium card.

name: Ace Trainer
text: You can play this card only if you have more Prize cards left than your opponent. \n\nEach player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, draw 6 cards. Your opponent draws 3 cards.

name: Ampharos Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Ampharos-EX.

name: Eco Arm
text: Shuffle 3 Pokémon Tool cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Energy Recycler
text: Shuffle 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Faded Town
text: At any time between turns, put 2 damage counters on each Mega Evolution Pokémon.

name: Forest of Giant Plants
text: Each player's Grass Pokémon can evolve during his or her first turn or the turn he or she plays those Pokémon.

name: Hex Maniac
text: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, each Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile has no Abilities. (This includes cards that come into play on that turn.)

name: Level Ball
text: Search your deck for a Pokémon with 90 HP or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Lucky Helmet
text: Whenever the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), draw 2 cards.

name: Lysandre
text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

name: Paint Roller
text: Discard any Stadium card in play. Then, draw a card.

name: Sceptile Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Sceptile-EX.

name: Tyranitar Spirit Link
text: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Tyranitar-EX.

name: Dangerous Energy
text:
This card can only be attached to Darkness Pokémon. This card provides Darkness Energy only while this card is attached to a Darkness Pokémon.

Whenever the Darkness Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon-EX (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon-EX.

(If this card is attached to anything other than a Darkness Pokémon, discard this card.)

name: Flash Energy
text:
This card can only be attached to Lightning Pokémon. This card provides Lightning Energy only while this card is attached to a Lightning Pokémon.

The Lightning Pokémon this card is attached to has no Weakness.

(If this card is attached to anything other than a Lightning Pokémon, discard this card.)

attacks.name: Aero Ball
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Deep Hurricane
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 70 more damage. Then, discard that Stadium card.

name: Steven
text: Search your deck for a Supporter card and a basic Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Tidal Storm
attacks.text: Move 2 Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon-EX. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Gaia Volcano
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 100 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

attacks.name: Emerald Break
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage times the number of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Energy Retrieval
text: Put 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Trainers' Mail
text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Trainer card you find there (except for Trainers' Mail) and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
